## NumericSelector variable

Represents a complex color selector for a dataset. Provides the options for each FieldBinding enum value: - Fixed: manually chosen hex color - Palette: a thematic-bound named color (so it auto-updates with theme changes) - Scale: field-bound to a thematic scale with domain, range, etc.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
NumericSelector: React.FC<NumericSelectorProps>
```
